title: Next.js Project Structure
subject: Next.js
theory:
Standard structure: 
- `app/`: App Router routes
- `public/`: Static files (images)
- `next.config.js`: Configuration
- `package.json`: Dependencies

common_mistakes.correction: Public is only for static assets.

interview_questions.question: What is the purpose of public folder?
interview_questions.answer: Stores static assets served from root URL.
